summary: Provides a Home Assistant integration for AlarmDecoder-compatible alarm panels, exposing an alarm control panel entity that synchronizes panel status, processes arming and disarming commands, and supports chime toggling via a dedicated service.
business_intent: Enable users to monitor and control Honeywell/DSC AlarmDecoder alarm systems through Home Assistant, allowing automation, remote arming/disarming, and status visibility within the smart home ecosystem.
